item.title: Car Dealer Tricks to Watch Out For
item.description: From hidden fees to bad financing offers, here are common dealership tactics that can cost buyers more than expected, plus advice on how to avoid them.

media:content.media:title: Car Dealer Tricks to Watch Out For
media:content.media:description: From hidden fees to bad financing offers, here are common dealership tactics that can cost buyers more than expected, plus advice on how to avoid them.

item.title: Car Mistake That Cost More Than You Think
item.description: Locking keys inside and breaking a window may feel quick, but it is pricier than calling a pro. A look at common car mistake that end up costing owners far more.

item.title: They Tinted The Windows On My Car
item.description: Fresh tint, new look—watch the transformation and see if it was worth it.

item.title: Salesman Do This Scam to Devalue Your Car!
item.description: A common tactic used to lower your trade-in value—don’t fall for it when selling your car.

item.title: Be Aware Of This Classic Sales Technique
item.description: Car dealers use this trick to pressure you into a bad deal—know it before you step on the lot.

item.title: Fixing a Tesla Model S Door Handle—Costly?
item.description: The retractable door handle on this Tesla Model S needs attention—see the repair process and find out if the cost matches its high-tech design.

item.title: This Is Why Dealers Want You To Put More Money Down
item.description: This Is Why Dealers Want You To Put More Money Down

item.title: Fixing a Tesla Model S Door Handle—Costly?
item.description: The retractable door handle on this Tesla Model S needs repair—see what it takes to fix it and whether the cost lives up to its reputation.

item.title: Why Dealers Push for Bigger Down Payments
item.description: Dealers often want higher down payments to reduce their risk, secure financing approval, and lower monthly payments—learn how it affects your car deal.

item.title: OMG
item.description: A moment that leaves you speechless—see the surprising turn of events that had everyone reacting the same way: OMG.

item.title: WHY WHY WHY???
item.description: Sometimes things just don’t make sense—see the moment that leaves everyone asking the same big question: why?

item.title: Bought Another Kia and a Blown-Engine Hyundai
item.description: Two more cars join the fleet—one with a blown engine. Was it a smart project buy or a costly mistake?

item.title: Do This to Make Your Car Last Longer
item.description: A simple maintenance step that can greatly extend your car’s life—skip it, and you could face costly repairs down the road.

item.title: How I Handled a Disastrous 1 Star Review
item.description: Turning criticism into growth—see how one bad review became a chance to improve, connect, and rebuild trust.

item.title: Lot Guy WRECKED My Customer’s Sold Corvette!
item.description: A costly mishap unfolds when a lot attendant crashes a Corvette that had already been sold—see how the situation plays out.

item.title: Car Dealer's Shady Tricks!
item.description: Learn about the tactics some dealers use to overcharge or mislead buyers—know what to watch for before your next car purchase.

item.description: Chevy Dude shares the story of a dealership mix-up that led to a missing vehicle.

item.title: Top 5 States to Avoid When Buying a Car
item.description: Chevy Dude breaks down the top states where buying a car could cost you more—thanks to taxes, fees, or vehicle condition risks—and what smart buyers should know before signing.
